name: Sonic The Fighters Blitz Hyper Edition
summary: Sonic The Fighters Blitz Hyper Edition (STFBHE) is the continuation of Sonic the Fighters Blitz (STFB), a 2D re-imagining of the arcade game Sonic The Fighters created by Restless Dipstick. STFBHE aims to rebalance and expand upon the original STFB.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Sonic The Fighters Blitz Hyper Edition Reveal Trailer
